    • Method Detail

      • send

        public boolean send(String command)

      • sendWithoutResponse

        public boolean sendWithoutResponse(String command)
        This method shall only be used if no response from network is expected. Else the read buffer is not cleared
        Parameters:
        command -
        Returns:
        true if send was successful

      • command

        public HeosCommands command()
        This method returns a class from type HeosCommands. Within this class all possible commands to control the HEOS network are defined.
        Returns:
        a class with all HEOS Commands

      • establishConnection

        public boolean establishConnection(boolean connectionDelay)
        Establishes the connection to the HEOS-Network if IP and Port is set.
        Parameters:
        connectionDelay - if set to true system waits for 10 seconds before connecting to event line
        Returns:
        true if connection is established else returns false

      • startHeartBeat

        public void startHeartBeat(int heartBeatPulse)
        Starts the HEOS Heart Beat. This held the connection open even if no data is transmitted. If the connection to the HEOS system is lost, the method reconnects to the HEOS system by calling the establishConnection() method. If the connection is lost or reconnect the method fires a bridgeEvent via the HeosEvenController.class
        See Also:
        establishConnection(), HeosEvenController.class

      • startEventListener

        public void startEventListener()

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
                     throws IOException,
                            InterruptedException
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • getPlayerState

        public HeosPlayer getPlayerState(String pid)
        This method update the current state of the HEOS Player like the play state title and so on. This method updates all states and shall be used for initialization only. For ongoing updates use the eventListener
        Parameters:
        pid - Player PID from the player
        Returns:
        a HEOS Player with the updated states

      • getAllPlayer

        public HashMap<String,HeosPlayer> getAllPlayer()
        This method returns a with all player found on the network after an connection to the system is established via a bridge.
        Returns:
        a HashMap with all HEOS Player in the network

      • getGroups

        public HashMap<String,HeosGroup> getGroups()
        This method searches for all groups which are on the HEOS network and returns a HashMap<String gid, HeosGroup heosGroup>. Before calling this method a connection via a bridge has to be established
        Returns:
        a HashMap with all HEOS groups

      • getGroupState

        public HeosGroup getGroupState(String gid)
        This method update the current state of the HEOS Group like the play state title and so on. This method updates all states and shall be used for initialization only. For ongoing updates use the eventListener
        Parameters:
        gid - Group GID from the group
        Returns:
        a HEOS group with the updated states
